system.description:
You have cooked up magically-martial tricks that most people have never seen and are probably a legendary figure for the devastation you bring. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, or Intelligence score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When you reduce a creature with a CR of at least half your character level to 0 hit points with a weapon attack, you recover a first-level spell slot if you have any used. If all of your first-level spell slots are unused, you gain temporary hit points equal to twice your proficiency bonus instead.
  • As an action, you can infuse a thrown item like an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.b0z0yz39b3qy3hdo]{Acid Flask}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.sh0462lz1jwwm4rm]{Vial of Holy Water}, or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.ukcav3i8dudpalir]{Tanglefoot Bag} with a spell and throw it at a target. If you hit, the target is affected by the item normally and the spell is cast on the target or the target’s space as applicable. If the spell would normally have multiple targets, it only affects the target of the thrown item.
  • As long as you have unused spell slots, every weapon you wield gains the Breaker property and counts as magical.
